text: (bright music)
- Here at Volkswagen Financial Services,

our mission is to be
the financial provider
for the whole Volkswagen Group.
As a financial service provider,

it's the first time that we
actually move into the cloud,
and we needed to really find a way

to develop everyone in one
direction that they understand

when they're coming from an
on-prem world to the cloud.
The AWS Training and Certification program

really helped us to
transform us as a company.
We were capable of defining a path

where all business and IT
is coming closer together,

that everyone understands
the need of each other

to provide our customers
better solutions in the cloud
and faster solutions for everyone.

- One of the main challenges
that we have identified so far

is that we are not
using the fully capacity

of all the services that
are available in the cloud.
By training in the AWS cloud,
we have been able to start a new part
to identify new architectures
and new way of developing digital products

to not only deliver these
products to our final customers,
but also reduce cost and be more efficient
on the way to do this.

One of the main impacts
that we are seeing right now

is that we are implementing
more efficient ways
to do what we used to do.
We are implementing and connecting Glue

with other solutions,
like QuickSight or Athena,

that is enabling us to make
these kind of developments

with less time coding and
more time just focusing

on enhancing the experience
of our final customers.

- One of the important things
really what AWS brought us

that we also were able to
integrate our business people

to bring our business
and IT closer together.

It was really nice to see
that AWS training programs
helped everyone to understand
the basic things they need to know.

The cloud can really
speed up our development,
move us, as a company, forward,

and define faster development
process for everyone.
